nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.elements

Interface BrokeringService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BrokeringServiceLocal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BrokeringServiceImpl, BrokeringServiceSecurity

    public interface BrokeringService
extends Service
    Service interface for brokering relationships (broker - registered members by broker)
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Method Detail

      • bulkChangeMemberBroker

        BulkMemberActionResultVO bulkChangeMemberBroker(FullTextMemberQuery query,
                                              Member newBroker,
                                              boolean suspendCommission,
                                              java.lang.String comments)
        Changes the broker of all members returned by the query. For members that already has such broker, nothing is done

      • changeBroker

        Brokering changeBroker(ChangeBrokerDTO dto)
                       throws MemberAlreadyInBrokeringsException,
                              CircularBrokeringException
        Changes de broker of the specified member. Should generate a BrokerRemark to keep track of this change.
        Parameters:
        dto - The new brokering data
        Returns:
        The result brokering. It may be:
        • The current open brokering if just suspending commission (the old and new brokers are the same and suspendCommission == true)
        • The new brokering if there's a new broker
        • null if the new broker is null
        Throws:
        CircularBrokeringException - When the member is the broker of the new broker, or recursively
        MemberAlreadyInBrokeringsException - When the member is already on the active broker's member list

      • getBrokering

        Brokering getBrokering(Member broker,
                     Member member)
                       throws ValidationException
        gets the active Brokering from the member and its broker.
        Parameters:
        broker - a Member being the broker
        member - a Member being the brokered member
        Returns:
        the active brokering between them.
        Throws:
        ValidationException

      • listPossibleStatuses

        java.util.Collection<BrokeringQuery.Status> listPossibleStatuses(BrokerGroup brokerGroup)
        Lists the available statuses for the given broker group

      • search

        java.util.List<Brokering> search(BrokeringQuery query)
        Search brokerings based on specified parameters

      • validate

        void validate(ChangeBrokerDTO dto)
              throws ValidationException
        Validates the brokering change DTO
        Throws:
        ValidationException
